courses.title: Communication
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: ENGL 1301

courses.title: American History
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: HIST 1301 or HIST 2327

courses.title: Introduction to Dance
courses.notes: Required course for Dance majors. Not required for Dance minors. Only offered Fall.

courses.title: Social and Behavioral Sciences
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options.

courses.title: Required Dance Technique Course: Foundations in Contemporary Dance or Ballet Foundations
courses.notes: Select Contemporary Dance or Ballet (15 credits required). See Degree Plan for Options. Recommended to select Contemporary Dance.

courses.title: Second Dance Technique
courses.notes: Select a Different Technique (15 credits required). See Degree Plan for options. Recommended DANC 2341 Ballet Foundations.

courses.title: Learning Framework
courses.notes: As required, based on credit hours earned, TSI status, High school rank, major declaration.

courses.title: Dance Improvisation
courses.prerequisite: Credit or registration in DANC 2246, DANC 2345, DANC 3246, DANC 3345, DANC 4246, or DANC 4345.
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement. Please note students must meet a pre-requisite or co-requisite of a Contemporary Dance technique course. Only offered Spring.

courses.title: Required Dance Technique: Foundations in Contemporary Dance or Ballet Foundations
courses.notes: Same Required Technique Class Contemporary Dance or Ballet (15 credits required). Recommended DANC 2345 Foundations in Contemporary Dance.

courses.title: Second Dance Technique
courses.notes: Continue with second technique selected. 15 credits required. See degree plan.
